Question: In 1957, this person performed this number on both The Tonight Show, hosted by Jack Paar, and The Ed Sullivan Show.
Hints: In 2008, this person had her second role as an animated character, in the film Horton Hears a Who!.
This person ended each show by tugging her ear, which was a message to her grandmother who raised her.
After her show ended, this person assumed a number of roles that departed from comedy.
